# Thank you for your contribution!

### Please fill this template

---

### Description

_**REQUIRED** - Describe the bug being fixed, what was broken and how does this fix it_

```text
Example: springdoc not showing correct tag
```

---

### Details

#### Cause

_What caused the bug?_

```text
Example: Not adding the tag in configuration
```
#### Solution

_How did you fix the issue?_

```text
Example: Added the tag in the configuration bean
```

---

### Testing

#### Verification

_How can I verify the bugfix?_

```text
Example: Check the swagger-ui under the tag group
```

#### Coverage

_Checklist to be sure the bugfix is covered_

- [ ] Unit tests created / modified
- [ ] Integration tests created / modified
- [ ] Contract tests created / modified
- [ ] Manual tests done for the scenario

#### Files created / modified

- TestClassOne.java
- TestClassTwo.java

### Issues

#### Issue number

_**REQUIRED** - The issue identification_

```text
Example: #34
```

#### Related issue

_The issue identification related to this change_

```text
Example: #30
```

#### Depends on issue

_The issue identification that this change depends on_

```text
Example: #35
```

### Additional information

_Any other information reviewers should know_

```text
Example: Vulnerability in wiremock dependency: CVE-2025-12345
```
